img_above_text:
![Field Fire Walkthrough \(18\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c9/Field_Fire_Walkthrough_%2818%29.png)
Continue on the path, where you'll be jumping into a gap on the left just before the flames -- a Flamling will appear as you get there. Pay close attention to this wall of flames on the right, because we'll be coming back here soon.
img_below_text:
The ball will burst through now to cover another portion of the path, so dash forward and head to the left again, where you'll find a Purple Lingzhi to harvest. Ignore the Scorching Flame enemy, as the ball will take care of this.
As the ball breaks through even further, run with it. You want it to be as far forward as it can go before you go up and to the gap on the left. Another Searing-Flame will appear here, and then you'll find a gap very close to you on the right, with yet another Searing-Flame.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Field Fire Walkthrough \(18\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c9/Field_Fire_Walkthrough_%2818%29.png)
Continue on the path, where you'll be jumping into a gap on the left just before the flames -- a Flamling will appear as you get there. Pay close attention to this wall of flames on the right, because we'll be coming back here soon."
        - Following Text: "The ball will burst through now to cover another portion of the path, so dash forward and head to the left again, where you'll find a Purple Lingzhi to harvest. Ignore the Scorching Flame enemy, as the ball will take care of this.
As the ball breaks through even further, run with it. You want it to be as far forward as it can go before you go up and to the gap on the left. Another Searing-Flame will appear here, and then you'll find a gap very close to you on the right, with yet another Searing-Flame."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a rocky path surrounded by flames, with a prominent arrow indicating a gap on the left side of the terrain. A damaged stone structure with intricate carvings is visible on the left, and flames block part of the path on the right. This scene appears to guide players to jump into the marked gap to progress, avoiding the flames and preparing for encounters with enemies like Flamling and Searing-Flame mentioned in the accompanying text.
